target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings, so the target vulnerability (access_control in mint function) was not identified at all.

notes: The audit incorrectly marked the contract as safe. The mint function is publicly callable by any address that becomes the minter (via setMinter), and there is no restriction on who can call setMinter initially. This creates a critical access control vulnerability where a compromised minter can mint unlimited tokens, exactly matching the documented PlayDapp exploit scenario.
